data.text: @kevin_j_foster A lot of twitter cleaning going on I see.... #kevout #nastyparty #ToriesDevoidOfShame #ToryRussianMoney #ToriesPartiedWhilePeopleDied https://t.co/AGAwEvvzvu
@kevin_j_foster Maybe we could invite some refugees from the Ukraine to help fix our roads, or I dunno, pick vegetables, what do you think Kev? #nastyparty #kevout https://t.co/592RgyyvT1
@kevin_j_foster Quite a week - have watched a Secretary of State and his Senior Minister on TV communicating effectively and looking like they know what they are doing. It’s been a long time 👍
